bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.15.4j-2013 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.15.4-2011 as amended by IEEE Std 802.15.4e-2012, IEEE Std 802.15.4f-2012, and IEEE Std 802.15.4g-2012)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: In this amendment to IEEE Std 802.15.4<sup>TM</sup>-2011, a physical layer for IEEE 802.15.4 in the 2360 MHz to 2400 MHz band which complies with Federal Communications Commission (FCC) MBAN rules is defined. Modifications to the MAC needed to support this new physical layer are also defined in this amendment.

In this amendment to IEEE Std 802.15.4TM-2011, a physical layer for IEEE 802.15.4 in the 2360 MHz to 2400 MHz band which complies with Federal Communications Commission (FCC) MBAN rules is defined. Modifications to the MAC needed to support this new physical layer are also defined in this amendment.
